intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Weird. Where's my son gone to? Damn his Deeprealm for being so big. I know I can't expect Kiragi to stay in his village all the time. But I thought at least he'd be out here, hunting or fishing. Somewhere.

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: Big Brother! Come quick! Those creepy soldiers have followed us here.

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Which ones? The really creepy soldiers?! Ugh. Of all the times... Kiragi might be here too!

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: What shall we do? They're coming towards us!

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Come on! We go to THEM!

intro.speaker: Kiragi
intro.line: What a day. Those fish pretty much jumped into my bucket! And then this bear - couldn't have been an easier target! Wish I'd bagged him a little closer to town. Too big to lug outta here. Too big to roll home too. Hmm. Gotta be some way... Er, hold on. What's that? Something lumbering around the forest... HELLO? Hmm, nothing. Eh, no way that's a person anyway. Too freaky. Whatever it is, it'll make a great trophy for my wall! All right. Fly straight and true, little arrow buddy. Ready, aim... FIRE!

intro.speaker: Kiragi
intro.line: That was a good one! Right between the... Uh, whoa. Hang on.

intro.speaker: Kiragi
intro.line: Uh-oh. Oopsies. Sorry 'bout that. But you really shoulda answered back. Looks like you brought friends too. Not very chatty, are ya? And call me crazy, but I'd swear you're all surrounding me. Yeah? No biggie. I've got the bow my dad gave me. Let's call this target practice!

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: Th-there's Kiragi! What's your son doing, taking on those soldiers by himself?!

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: HANG ON, KIRAGI! DAD'S ON THE WAY!

battle-talk.speaker: Kiragi
battle-talk.line: Dad! I knew you'd show up!

battle-talk.speaker: Takumi
battle-talk.line: Huh? Sorry that I got here, uh, late? You must have been scared to death.

battle-talk.speaker: Kiragi
battle-talk.line: Nope. I knew you'd save me.

battle-talk.speaker: Kiragi
battle-talk.line: Yup! But anyway, you gotta check out this big bear that I bagged, Dad!

battle-talk.speaker: Takumi
battle-talk.line: Ah, right. Big bear. Nice. But, uh, how about we focus on getting out of this mess alive, Son?

end.speaker: Kiragi
end.line: Dad, no way! No! Way! There is NO way this is what you do every day.

end.speaker: Takumi
end.line: This is nothing! You should have seen me in my last battle, when I— Uh, hold on. Not the best dad talk. I mean to say, Son, that battle was dangerous. Even deadly.

end.speaker: Kiragi
end.line: So fun! So! Fun! It was SO fun, seeing you all be like, you know... YAAAH! BLAMMIE! I want to be just like you, Dad!

end.speaker: Takumi
end.line: Ugh... No, Son. You have to stay safe here in your Deeprealm.

end.speaker: Kiragi
end.line: Hey, but we had a blast, didn't we? Yeah, I'm coming with you for sure!

end.speaker: Takumi
end.line: What?! No, you're not. I put you here to keep you OUT of the war.

end.speaker: Sakura
end.line: Well, you have to admit he was a chip off the old block there.

end.speaker: Kiragi
end.line: Wow! Two against one. Done deal, yeah, Dad? Yeah.

end.speaker: Takumi
end.line: Two against—? Oh, fine. I guess. How could I say no to a face like that?

end.speaker: Kiragi
end.line: Yay for my face! I swear I won't let you down, Dad. Oh, hey! Wait. The OTHER thing. The bear I shot. Dad! Dad! It was amazing. DAD! I got it in one shot!

end.speaker: Takumi
end.line: I bet it was, Son. And thanks to you, our camp will feast on bear stew!
